msgSnippet: Hi John, you may have a look at Coverage from Rational or JTest from Parasoft. Greetings, Jorg

Subject: RE: [junit] Test coverage metrics reporting tool

Hi John,

you may have a look at Coverage from Rational or JTest from Parasoft.

Greetings,
Jorg

>-----Original Message-----
>From: John Stetic [mailto:johns@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, June 26, 2001 3:50 AM
>To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com '
>Subject: RE: [junit] Test coverage metrics reporting tool
>
>
>Thanks for all the suggestions.  We are looking at some commercial code
>coverage tools - and I'll definitely check into the open 
>source options now
>- but that's not really what I'm trying to accomplish.  (I was 
>wondering if
>using the term code coverage might confuse the issue).  I want to do a
>static analyst of the code to check which classes and methods 
>have tests.
>Think of it as Lint for Junit - Jint perhaps :-)
>
>John
subject: RE: [junit] Test coverage metrics reporting tool
